feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 80 to 100 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Peak rates of 25 to 40 mm/h possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 80 to 110 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, mainly east of Rotorua, with localised downpours 25 to 40 mm/h possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 60 to 80 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, especially in the east. Intensities of 10 to 20 mm per hour are possible. There is a slight chance of downpours with higher intensities. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 50 to 70 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen. Intensities of 10 to 20 mm per hour are possible from this afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 30 to 50 mm of rain on top of what has already fallen, especially about higher ground with localised downpours 25 to 40 mm/h possible. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
